CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 15, 1957, pg. 8, reads: "Tots Graduated - Graduation exercises for the St. Brigid Roman Catholic Church Kindergarten were held June 9. The caps and gowns worn by the young graduates were provided by the newly organized Parent Group of the church.  Father Paul Bassompierre and Sister Rose Elizabeth are pictured with the members of the graduation class. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of St. Brigid kindergarten graduates wearing light colored caps and gowns, with Monsignor Paul Bassompierre, and Sister Rose Elizabeth in background, posed on steps in front of St. Brigid Rectory, vertical format
